sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>sheep</radical> with <radical>feathers</radical> (and presumably wings, too) is able to <kanji>fly</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Imagine the sheep with feathers taking off and flying around. It's an odd sight, but makes sense, kind of.
readingMnemonic: Watching that sheep with feathers and wings flying around made you thirsty. You remember that you have a <reading>ca</reading>r <reading>ke</reading>ttle (<ja>かけ</ja>), so you reach into your car and grab your car kettle to make a special car-kettle brew.
readingInfo: Imagine yourself enjoying the cozy car-kettle brew, while admiring the unusual sight of the sheep with feathers and wings flying through the sky. This is just shear bliss!
